verbose_text: In previous studies, we found that systemic clonidine, an alpha2 noradrenergic auto-receptor agonist, which decreases tonic noradrenaline levels, behaviorally and mentally suppressed VTE processes--both the behavioral manifestation of VTE and the forward representations in hippocampus within theta cycles.
evidence: noradrenaline levels              , behaviorally and mentally suppressed VTE
